question: What are eco-friendly shopping bags
answer: These are shopping bags made from biodegradable and recyclable materials that are reusable and promote environmental sustainability.

question: What is the ecological advantage of eco-friendly bags over plastic bags?
answer: Eco-friendly bags can be reused as many times as possible, and at end-of-life, they can be recycled or composted.

question: What materials can be used to produce eco-friendly and reusable shopping bags?
answer: Plant fiber materials such as banana, plantain, jute, bamboo, etc., which are reusable, compostable, and recyclable.

question: Does the shopping bag come in different sizes?
answer: Yes. Small, Medium and Large.

question: What is the durability and lifespan of the reusable shopping bag?
answer: It is strong and can last between 2-3 years, based on usage rate and maintenance.

question: What is the best way to dispose ShoppersBag reusable shopping bag when it's worn out?
answer: At the end of life, ShoppersBag reusable bags should be dropped off at designated collection points for recycling.

question: What is ShoppersBag?
answer: ShoppersBag is a digital technology that drives the reduction in production, usage, and disposal of single-use plastics, working with Eco-friendly Bag Producers, Brands, Stores and Malls to drive sustainability in the retail value chain.

question: What makes ShoppersBag different?
answer: ShoppersBag are marked with a unique tag that has a QR Code and 2D Barcode which tracks and rewards usage in stores and malls. This unique tag enables the integration of eco-friendly shopping bags into the ShoppersBag Distribution System.

question: Is ShoppersBag available on Apple & Google Play Store?
answer: Yes. ShoppersBag is available and free to download on both Apple and Google Play store.

question: How does the QR code work?
answer: Users can scan the QR code to activate their shopping bags which will enable them to earn incentives for every usage in stores and malls.

question: How does the 2D Barcode work?
answer: It enables ShoppersBag track and reward  in-store usage of your shopping bag.

question: How do I earn from the ShoppersBag App?
answer: As you participate in campaigns (in-store or online) on the ShoppersBag app.

question: Who gives out the rewards I earn from ShoppersBag?
answer: Partnering brands and stores that are driving reduction in single-use plastics in the retail value chain.

question: What kind of rewards can I earn with ShoppersBag?
answer: Discounts, promos, raffle and gift items.

question: How can Eco-friendly Bag Producers work with ShoppersBag?
answer: By registering as an eco-friendly bag producer on the ShoppersBag app and purchasing ShoppersBag unique tags for their reusable shopping bags. This will enable your bag to be linked to the ShoppersBag distribution system.

question: What is the benefit of ShoppersBag to eco-friendly bag producers?
answer: ShoppersBag provides access to market for bag producers to increase their revenue and contribute to environmental sustainability.

question: Where can I buy ShoppersBag's reusable shopping bags?
answer: You can buy ShoppersBag reusable shopping bags from partnering stores and malls near you or online at: www.shoppersbag.co/nearbystores

question: How do I ensure that my reusable shopping bag can earn incentives?
answer: By purchasing your reusable shopping bag from partnering stores/outlets.

question: Where can I scan my ShoppersBag?
answer: At point of sales in designated stores/outlets.

question: Can I have more than one ShoppersBag reusable shopping bag?
answer: Yes. You can have as many ShoppersBag reusable shopping bags as possible, and they will be linked to your ShoppersBag account.

question: Can I use my activated ShoppersBag reusable shopping bag in more than one store?
answer: Yes. You can use your ShoppersBag reusable shopping bag in any partnering store

question: How can  partnering brands launch a campaign on ShoppersBag app?
answer: www.shoppersbag.co/how-brands-can-launch-campaign-on-shoppersbag-app

question: What will stores require to track reusable shopping bag usage?
answer: A 2D barcode scanner that is connected with a smart device

question: What is ShoppersBag reusable shopping bag suitable for?
answer: ShoppersBag reusable shopping bags are suitable for shopping, corporate gifts, packaging etc.

question: Do I have to pay to use ShoppersBag reusable shopping bags?
answer: Brands can give them as gifts to their customers, and shoppers can also buy them.

question: How does ShoppersBag provide support to women and girls?
answer: Through the HerFibre and Eco-Girls Support Scheme

question: What benefits do brands get from partnering with ShoppersBag?
answer: They earn sustainability badge by contributing to the reduction and elimination of single-use plastic waste pollution in the retail value chain  and support the empowerment of women and girls in eco-friendly bag production.
